description: The problem is that when trying to use the heapq module to sort a large list of data, an OverflowError is raised due to the exceeding of the maximum size of the heap. This causes the list to not be sorted correctly and results in an unexpected output.
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 8, in <module>
NameError: name 'he' is not defined
